languages.text: "Я отметил, что подле Вашей Светлости на церемонии присутствовала союзница нелюдской природы. Я читаю в этом знак открывающихся возможностей... кхм... взаимодействия протектората с расами ксеносов. И эта перспектива выглядит весьма захватывающей. Я буду счастлив, если мне удастся послужить Вашей светлости в этой сфере".

"I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."
languages.original_text: "Я отметил, что подле Вашей Светлости на церемонии присутствовала союзница нелюдской природы. Я читаю в этом знак открывающихся возможностей... кхм... взаимодействия протектората с расами ксеносов. И эта перспектива выглядит весьма захватывающей. Я буду счастлив, если мне удастся послужить Вашей светлости в этой сфере".

I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the trade empire and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

languages.text: 「人外の血筋を持つ仲間が、式典で陛下の脇に立っていたことを考えずにいられないんです。可能性が出てきたんじゃないかって、その…あの…護民官と異種族が協力する可能性です。かつてない興奮をおぼえます。この地域で陛下にお仕えできることを、嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: 「人外の血筋を持つ仲間が、式典で陛下の脇に立っていたことを考えずにいられないんです。可能性が出てきたんじゃないかって、その…あの…護民官と異種族が協力する可能性です。かつてない興奮をおぼえます。この地域で陛下にお仕えできることを、嬉しく思います」

languages.text: “我不禁注意到，当时在典礼上，大人身边站着一位并非人类的盟友。我认为，这预示着王朝与……呃……异形之间的合作正在有条不紊地进行。这是个令人兴奋的机遇，我很乐意在这样的舞台上为您效劳，大人。”
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: “我不禁注意到，当时在典礼上，大人身边站着一位并非人类的盟友。我认为，这预示着王朝与……呃……异形之间的合作正在有条不紊地进行。这是个令人兴奋的机遇，我很乐意在这样的舞台上为您效劳，大人。”

languages.text: «No he podido evitar ver a una aliada de origen no humano junto a mi{mf|lord|lady} durante la ceremonia. Lo considero una señal de las numerosas posibilidades de... esto... colaboración entre el protectorado y las razas xenos. Es una oportunidad emocionante. Me gustaría servir a mi{mf|lord|lady} en este ámbito».
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: «No he podido evitar ver a una aliada de origen no humano junto a mi{mf|lord|lady} durante la ceremonia. Lo considero una señal de las numerosas posibilidades de... esto... colaboración entre el protectorado y las razas xenos. Es una oportunidad emocionante. Me gustaría servir a mi{mf|lord|lady} en este ámbito».

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas pu m'empêcher de remarquer qu'une race non humaine se tenait aux côtés de Votre Seigneurie lors de la cérémonie. Devons-nous en déduire qu'une éventuelle... collaboration est envisageable entre le protectorat et les xénos ? Si c'est le cas, l'avenir est plein de possibilités. Je serais plus que ravi de servir Votre Seigneurie dans ce domaine. »
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas pu m'empêcher de remarquer qu'une race non humaine se tenait aux côtés de Votre Seigneurie lors de la cérémonie. Devons-nous en déduire qu'une éventuelle... collaboration est envisageable entre le protectorat et les xénos ? Si c'est le cas, l'avenir est plein de possibilités. Je serais plus que ravi de servir Votre Seigneurie dans ce domaine. »

languages.text: "Mir ist bei der Zeremonie eine Verbündete nicht-menschlicher Herkunft an der Seite Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aufgefallen. Ich betrachte das als Zeichen für eine ... äh ... Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Protektorat und den Xenos-Spezies. Eine überaus spannende Gelegenheit. Ich würde mich sehr freuen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} dabei zu unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist bei der Zeremonie eine Verbündete nicht-menschlicher Herkunft an der Seite Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aufgefallen. Ich betrachte das als Zeichen für eine ... äh ... Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Protektorat und den Xenos-Spezies. Eine überaus spannende Gelegenheit. Ich würde mich sehr freuen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} dabei zu unterstützen."

languages.text: "İster istemez törende yanınızda insan dışı bir dostunuzun olduğunu fark ettim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu durumu, protektoranızla zeno ırkları arasında... Nasıl desem... Bir iş birliği ihtimalinin artması olarak yorumlamamak elde değil. Son derece heyecan verici bir fırsat. Bu alanda size hizmet etmekten keyif duyarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "I could not help but notice an ally of non-human origin standing beside Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} at the ceremony. I see that as a sign of unfolding possibilities for... ah... collaboration between the protectorate and the xenos races. The opportunity is most thrilling. I would be delighted to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in this arena."

traits.locale_text: "İster istemez törende yanınızda insan menşeili olmayan bir dostunuzun olduğunu fark ettim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu durumu, protektoranızla zeno ırkları arasında... Nasıl desem... Bir iş birliği ihtimalinin artması olarak yorumlamamak elde değil. Son derece heyecan verici bir fırsat bu. Bu alanda size hizmet etmekten keyif alırım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
